mapper.select: SELECT a.ticketing_sq AS ticketingsq, a.ticket_sq AS ticketsq, TO_CHAR(b.ticketing_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ticketingdate, d.show_name AS showname, a.ticket_no AS ticketno, a.ticket_seat AS ticketseat, TO_CHAR(c.start_time, 'YYYY.MM.DD" "HH24"시 "MI"분') AS starttime, a.ticket_seat_price AS ticketseatprice, a.ticket_stat AS ticketstat, a.ticket_active AS ticketactive, c.show_sq AS showsq FROM ticket a FULL OUTER JOIN ticketing b ON a.ticketing_sq = b.ticketing_sq LEFT JOIN showing c ON a.showing_sq = c.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show d ON c.show_sq = d.show_sq WHERE a.ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) AND a.ticket_stat = #{stat} AND a.showing_sq IN ( SELECT DISTINCT showing_sq FROM ticket WHERE ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) )

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.transfer_board_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS transferboardregdate, b.transfer_board_sq AS transferboardsq, a.ticket_sq AS ticketsq, d.show_name AS showname, a.ticket_seat AS ticketseat, a.ticket_seat_price AS ticketseatprice, b.hope_price AS hopeprice, a.ticket_stat AS ticketstat, a.ticket_active AS ticketactive FROM ticket a INNER JOIN transfer_board b ON a.ticket_sq = b.ticket_sq LEFT JOIN showing c ON a.showing_sq = c.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show d ON c.show_sq = d.show_sq WHERE a.ticket_stat = 4 AND a.ticketing_sq IN ( SELECT ticketing_sq FROM ticketing WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} ) ORDER BY transferboardsq desc
